description: Commands to perform operations on Service.

commands.name: az cosmosdb service create
examples: az cosmosdb service create --resource-group MyResourceGroup --account-name MyAccount --name "sqlDedicatedGateway" --count 3 --size "Cosmos.D4s"

commands.name: az cosmosdb service create
examples: az cosmosdb service create --resource-group MyResourceGroup --account-name MyAccount --name "sqlDedicatedGateway" --kind "SqlDedicatedGateway" --count 3 --size "Cosmos.D4s"
az cosmosdb service create --resource-group MyResourceGroup --account-name MyAccount --name "MaterializedViewsBuilder" --kind "MaterializedViewsBuilder" --count 3 --size "Cosmos.D4s"

commands.name: az cosmosdb service delete
commands.summary: Delete the given cosmosdb service resource.
examples: az cosmosdb service delete --resource-group MyResourceGroup --account-name MyAccount --name "sqlDedicatedGateway"

commands.name: az cosmosdb service delete
commands.summary: Delete the given cosmosdb service resource.
examples: az cosmosdb service delete --resource-group MyResourceGroup --account-name MyAccount --name "sqlDedicatedGateway"
az cosmosdb service delete --resource-group MyResourceGroup --account-name MyAccount --name "MaterializedViewsBuilder"

commands.name: az cosmosdb service list
commands.summary: List all cosmosdb service resource under an account.
examples: az cosmosdb service list --resource-group MyResourceGroup --account-name MyAccount

commands.name: az cosmosdb service list
commands.summary: List all cosmosdb service resource under an account.
examples: az cosmosdb service list --resource-group MyResourceGroup --account-name MyAccount

commands.name: az cosmosdb service show
commands.summary: Get cosmosdb service resource under an account.
examples: az cosmosdb service show --resource-group MyResourceGroup --account-name MyAccount --name "sqlDedicatedGateway"

commands.name: az cosmosdb service show
commands.summary: Get cosmosdb service resource under an account.
examples: az cosmosdb service show --resource-group MyResourceGroup --account-name MyAccount --name "sqlDedicatedGateway"

commands.name: az cosmosdb service update
examples: az cosmosdb service update --resource-group MyResourceGroup --account-name MyAccount --name "sqlDedicatedGateway" --count 3

commands.name: az cosmosdb service update
examples: az cosmosdb service update --resource-group MyResourceGroup --account-name MyAccount --name "sqlDedicatedGateway" --kind "SqlDedicatedGateway" --count 3
az cosmosdb service update --resource-group MyResourceGroup --account-name MyAccount --name "MaterializedViewsBuilder" --kind "MaterializedViewsBuilder" --count 3
